[[Image:1998 Khandlendar compiled by Sal: The '''[[1998]] Khandlendar compiled by Salman Rushtoes''' is a hand-made calendar made and published by Alex Lewis. Featured illustrators include artists with (somewhat unusual) pseudonyms Mustaphaa Goa Ttitt, Renee Neeneerenee, Serena Di'Consuello, Clarence Bywater-Hicks VI and Clara Brandybuck. The word "Khandlendar" is a pun on [[Khand]], a region south of [[Mordor]].
